channel.title: back-to-school on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in back-to-school on FinanClub

item.title: M
item.description: score:144 Chances: Macy’s kicks off the back-to-school season with a wide range of fashion and accessories. The consumer cyclical sector is gaining steam this year. Macy’s to report second quarter 2023 sales and earnings results on August 22, 2023. Retailers like Macy’s expanding use of ‘breathable’ and ‘cooling’ fabrics to boost sales during heat waves.

item.title: CMCSA
item.description: score:118 Chances: Comcast’s broadband network’s importance to future technology could positively impact its stock. Growing demand for high-speed Internet and increased media consumption benefiting CMCSA. Comcast offering fast, reliable, and affordable internet for back-to-school needs could attract more customers. Partnerships and expansions in the entertainment industry, such as new film studios, could enhance Comcast’s market position.
